column4: Gah, my grub file just randomly stopped working. I can't get into Ubuntu. I don't know how to edit it from LiveCD. Gah, I don't know what to do...
I'm in the live cd mode now
Hey. Trying to get grub to work.
How can I edit it from livecd?
For some reason grub decided to completely stop working. I literally have no idea why.
Hmm. Can you burn a supergrub CD?
It would be the easiest way to fix it.
DO you have any old copies of menu-list?
Try one of the old copies.
I don't know how to get to those backups
Mount the drive, then they should be in /boot/grub, I think.
